DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate safety tolerability SU5416 patient AIDS-related Kaposi 's sarcoma . II . Determine pharmacokinetics regimen patient . III . Evaluate antitumor effect biological activity regimen patient . IV . Determine safety regimen HIV replication immune parameter patient . OUTLINE : This dose escalation , multicenter study . Patients receive SU5416 intravenous injection twice weekly 4 week . Patients may continue treatment maximum 1 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . In absence dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) first 6 patient treat , subsequent cohort 6 patient receive escalate dos SU5416 schedule . If DLT occur 2 6 patient give dose level , dose escalation cease next low dose declare maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) . Six additional patient treat MTD . Patients follow 30 day last treatment , every 3 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : This study accrue maximum 30 patient .
